text: 1.2: Ro 1.7; 8.29; 2 Te 2.13; Hi 10.22; 12.24; 2 Pi 1.2Fhe Bakɨme fhum wo vuzvugar ana nden won mbuigim, nde ana gumgi gu mbigira ki. Ana Ŋina Ŋaar nden kurkurigim, nde za wari won ruru tɨvi gum bigi ndiv, zam anan nɨɨŋgiap, ana nɨman ŋgarav ki. Nde ŋgarav kɨv, nde tuituigip Zisas Kraisan buni vhuuiŋ zɨn ŋgɨrim, ana vɨzɨn nde ruarim, nde Fhe Bakɨme rɨmani nɨman ŋgaravra kɨrga. Fhe Bakɨmen kora muumbar khaŋ tɨgɨp nde phorgɨ kɨrim, nde ndavi mbɨrav, wari kɨri.
